fee_waiver: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹3,00,000 in a year.

tata_neu_app.notes: 5% as a base rate + 5% for NeuPass members. Includes bill payments on Tata Neu.

partner_tata_brands.notes: On Croma, BigBasket, Tata CLiQ, Taj Hotels, etc.

other_spends.notes: Applies to all other domestic and international spends.

welcome_benefits: 1499 NeuCoins on the Tata Neu app after the first transaction within 30 days.

lounge_access.domestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter).
lounge_access.international: 4 complimentary visits per year with Priority Pass (1 per quarter).

other_benefits: 1 NeuCoin = ₹1, redeemable on the Tata Neu app and partner brands.
suitability: Extremely valuable for users deeply integrated into the Tata ecosystem, especially for grocery shopping on BigBasket and other Tata brands.

amazon_prime.notes: 5% unlimited cashback on Amazon.in for Prime members.

amazon_non_prime.notes: 3% unlimited cashback on Amazon.in for non-Prime members.

amazon_pay_partners.notes: 2% cashback on bill payments and recharges through Amazon Pay.

welcome_benefits: Varies by offer, often includes Amazon vouchers.
other_benefits: No Cost EMI options on Amazon.
suitability: A must-have for heavy Amazon shoppers, especially Prime members. Best-in-class rewards for Amazon purchases.

fee_waiver: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹3,50,000 in a year.

flipkart_myntra.notes: Unlimited 5% cashback on Flipkart and Myntra.

preferred_partners.notes: 4% cashback on preferred partners like Swiggy, Uber, PVR, Curefit.

welcome_benefits: Welcome benefits include Flipkart vouchers and Swiggy discounts.
suitability: The default choice for frequent shoppers on Flipkart and Myntra, with solid returns on other popular lifestyle categories.

fee_waiver: Annual fee reversed on spending ₹2,00,000 or more in the preceding year.

online_spends.notes: No merchant restrictions. Capped at ₹5,000 cashback per monthly statement cycle.

offline_spends.notes: Includes utility bill payments. Excludes rent, fuel, wallet loads.

other_benefits: 1% fuel surcharge waiver, up to ₹100 per month.
suitability: Excellent for users with high and diverse online spending across various merchants due to its high, uncategorized cashback rate.

partner_merchants.notes: On Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Swiggy, Zomato, Uber etc. Capped at 1000 CashPoints per month.

all_other_spends.notes: Applies to all other spends, including EMIs and wallet loads. Capped at 1000 CashPoints per month.

welcome_benefits: 1000 CashPoints after payment of joining fee.

milestone_benefits.condition: On spending ₹1,00,000 in a calendar quarter.

lounge_access.domestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter).

other_benefits: Redemption: 1 CashPoint = ₹1 for statement credit (min 500 points).
suitability: Ideal for young professionals with spending concentrated on major online platforms and who can meet quarterly spending milestones.

fee_waiver: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹2,00,000 in a year.

bill_payments_google_pay.notes: Bill payments, recharges via Google Pay. Capped at ₹500 per month.

food_delivery_cabs.notes: Swiggy, Zomato, Ola. Combined monthly cap of ₹500 for 5% & 4% categories.

other_spends.notes: Unlimited cashback on all other spends.

other_benefits: Up to 20% off at partner restaurants.
suitability: Best for users who pay utility bills and recharges via Google Pay and have significant food delivery/cab spends.

travel_spends.notes: 20% Scapia coins on travel bookings made on the Scapia App. 5 coins = ₹1.

all_other_spends.notes: 10% Scapia coins on all online and offline spends.

lounge_access.domestic: Unlimited (conditional on spending ₹5k in previous billing cycle).

other_benefits: Zero forex markup on all international transactions
suitability: The best lifetime-free card for international travelers due to its zero forex markup. Ideal for those who can meet the minimum spend for unlimited lounge access.

fee_waiver: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹2,00,000 in a year.

myntra_spends.notes: Instant 7.5% discount on Myntra, up to ₹750 per transaction.

preferred_partners.notes: 5% cashback on partners like Swiggy, Swiggy Instamart, PVR, Cleartrip, Urban Company.

other_spends.notes: Unlimited 1.25% cashback on all other spends.

milestone_benefits.reward: Free access to PVR movie tickets.

lounge_access.domestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter), on spending ₹50,000 in the previous quarter.

suitability: A must-have for frequent Myntra shoppers and users who spend on its partner brands like Swiggy and PVR.

fee_waiver: Annual fee waived on spends of ₹2,00,000 in a year.

phonepe_spends.notes: 3% cashback on all spends on the PhonePe app, including bill payments, travel, and food orders. Capped at ₹500/month.

partner_merchants.notes: 2% cashback on partner merchants like Flipkart, Myntra, and Swiggy. Capped at ₹500/month.

other_spends.notes: 1% cashback on all other spends. Capped at ₹200/month.

other_benefits: RuPay variant can be linked to UPI
suitability: Best for users who extensively use the PhonePe app for various payments and want a simple cashback card integrated with the app.

partner_brands.notes: 20 Reward Points per ₹150 spent at Marks & Spencer, Myntra, Nykaa, Reliance Digital. Capped at 5,000 points per month.

other_spends.notes: 4 Reward Points per ₹150 spent. Good redemption value on SmartBuy portal for flights.

welcome_benefits: Complimentary Club Vistara Silver & MMT Black Elite memberships on spending ₹1 lakh within 90 days.

milestone_benefits.condition: On spending ₹5,00,000 in an anniversary year.
On spending ₹7,50,000 in an anniversary year.

lounge_access.international: 6 complimentary visits per year via Priority Pass.

other_benefits: Good redemption options for flights and hotels on SmartBuy portal.
suitability: A strong mid-range card for those who spend on travel and premium brands, offering a good mix of rewards and travel perks.

general_spends.notes: 12 EDGE Reward points per ₹200. Transfer value to airline partners is 5:4.

travel_portal.notes: 30 EDGE Reward points per ₹200 on Axis Travel Edge portal.

welcome_benefits: Choice of one: Luxe gift card, The Postcard Hotels voucher, or a Yatra voucher worth ₹12,500.

lounge_access.domestic: Unlimited, plus 8 guest visits per year.
lounge_access.international: Unlimited with Priority Pass, plus 8 guest visits per year.

other_benefits: Buy One Get One on BookMyShow up to ₹500 twice a month.
suitability: For high-spenders and frequent international travelers who can maximize travel benefits and point transfers to airlines.

base_rate.notes: 5 Reward Points for every ₹150 spent. 1 RP = ₹1 on Smartbuy for flights.

smartbuy_portal.notes: Get up to 10x points (33.3% value) on travel & shopping via SmartBuy. Capped at 7,500 points per month.

welcome_benefits: Complimentary annual memberships (Amazon Prime, Swiggy One etc.) on spending ₹1.5 lakhs within 90 days.

milestone_benefits.condition: On spending ₹80,000 in a calendar month.
milestone_benefits.reward: Choice of vouchers from Ola Cabs, cult.fit Live, BookMyShow, or TataCLiQ worth ₹500.

lounge_access.domestic: Unlimited for primary and add-on members.
lounge_access.international: Unlimited for primary and add-on members.

suitability: An iconic premium card, excellent for high-spenders who can leverage the SmartBuy portal for accelerated rewards and enjoy unlimited lounge access.

online_spends.notes: 6X rewards on online spends up to ₹30,000 per month.

lounge_access.domestic: 4 complimentary airport and spa visits per quarter.

other_benefits: Buy one get one on movie tickets up to ₹500, twice a month.
suitability: One of the best Lifetime Free premium cards, offering great rewards, comprehensive travel benefits, and low forex markup.

base_rate.notes: 1 MR Point per ₹50 spent. Value comes from milestone benefits.

welcome_benefits: 10,000 bonus Membership Rewards points redeemable for ₹3,000 worth of travel vouchers.

milestone_benefits.reward: Additional vouchers plus a ₹10,000 Taj Stay voucher.

lounge_access.domestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter).

other_benefits: Points can be transferred to airline/hotel partners.
suitability: Perfect for users who can consolidate their annual spending to meet milestone targets, offering one of the best reward rates in its class via milestone achievement.
